gsx_active.label: Activate Plug-in
gsx_active.comment:
• Yes: Add GlobalShopex Plug-in code to website
  • No: Remove GlobalShopex Plug-in code from website

typeintegration.label: Enable Iframe or Cart To Cart:
typeintegration.comment:
• If you select Iframe.
  • If you Select Cart To Cart

gsx_is_live.label: Enable International Shipping Live/Review International Shipping:
gsx_is_live.comment:
• If you select Enable International Shipping the international checkout will be live on your site.
  • If you select review international shipping you can add “?gsx” to the end of the link in your cart page and you will be able to test the international checkout process.

gsxmerchatid.label: Merchant ID
gsxmerchatid.comment:
Please provide the 7 digit MerchantID created by GlobalShopex.
Click here to obtain your merchant id http://www.globalshopex.com/magento

gsx_enablehttps.label: HTTPS enable
gsx_enablehttps.comment:
• Yes: Your site https in the cart page
  • No: your site Don't have https (redirect https to http)

gsx_cssclassbutton.label: CSS Class Name for button
gsx_cssclassbutton.comment: You may edit the name Css Class of the international checkout button here.

gsx_styletag.label: Content for Style tag
gsx_styletag.comment: You may enter content for "style" tag to design the text of international checkout button if you prefer to use text instead of upload a button.

gsx_pathimage.label: Globalshopex Button Image
gsx_pathimage.comment: The international shipping button provided by GlobalShopex is a default international checkout button. You may upload your own graphic here to display in the cart or use the one provided. Sample /media/Gsx/images/default/gsx_button.gif

gsx_local_shipping.label: Local Shipping
gsx_local_shipping.comment: Enter the standard flat rate or standard domestic shipping program for any shipping costs to arrive from your store to GlobalShopex fulfillment center. If free domestic shipping to GlobalShopex enter 0.

gsx_local_shippingexp.label: Local Shipping EXP
gsx_local_shippingexp.comment: Enter the priority flat rate or standard priority shipping program for any shipping costs to arrive from your store to GlobalShopex fulfillment center. If no priority shipping service offered or no cost for shipping priority to GlobalShopex enter 0.

gsx_name_field_restricted.label: Name Attribute Restricted
gsx_name_field_restricted.comment: Enter the name of field for restricted items.
